courses.title: Calculus I - Differential Calculus
courses.description: Comprehensive introduction to limits, derivatives, and their applications. Includes lecture notes, problem sets, solution guides, and practice exams covering topics from basic limits to optimization problems.

courses.title: Linear Algebra
courses.description: Complete course materials on vector spaces, matrices, eigenvalues, and linear transformations. Features step-by-step proofs, computational exercises, and real-world applications in engineering and computer science.
courses.keywords: linear algebra mathematics math matrices vectors

courses.title: Statistics & Probability
courses.description: Statistical analysis fundamentals including descriptive statistics, probability distributions, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis. Contains datasets, R/Python code examples, and comprehensive study materials.

courses.title: Discrete Mathematics
courses.description: Essential mathematical foundations for computer science including logic, set theory, graph theory, and combinatorics. Perfect preparation for advanced algorithms and theoretical computer science courses.
courses.keywords: discrete mathematics math logic computer science

courses.title: Organic Chemistry
courses.description: Comprehensive organic chemistry materials covering reaction mechanisms, synthesis strategies, and spectroscopic analysis. Includes reaction summaries, mechanism practice problems, and laboratory procedures.

courses.title: General Physics I - Mechanics
courses.description: Classical mechanics from kinematics to rotational dynamics. Features problem-solving strategies, conceptual explanations, laboratory exercises, and mathematical derivations with worked examples.

courses.title: Molecular Biology
courses.description: Modern molecular biology techniques and concepts including DNA replication, gene expression, and protein synthesis. Contains research papers, laboratory protocols, and current biotechnology applications.

courses.title: Environmental Science
courses.description: Interdisciplinary approach to environmental issues including climate change, pollution control, and sustainable development. Features case studies, policy analyses, and field research methodologies.

courses.title: World Literature
courses.description: Comprehensive study of global literary traditions from ancient epics to contemporary works. Includes critical essays, historical context materials, discussion guides, and comparative analysis frameworks.

courses.title: Modern European History
courses.description: Detailed examination of European history from the Renaissance to present day. Contains primary source documents, timeline summaries, biographical profiles, and analytical essay examples.

courses.title: Philosophy of Mind
courses.description: Exploration of consciousness, personal identity, and the mind-body problem. Features philosophical texts, argument analysis templates, and contemporary debates in cognitive science and artificial intelligence.

courses.title: Cultural Anthropology
courses.description: Study of human societies and cultural practices across the globe. Includes ethnographic studies, fieldwork methodologies, theoretical frameworks, and cross-cultural comparison tools.

courses.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
courses.description: Fundamental computer science concepts including arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, and algorithmic analysis. Contains code implementations in multiple languages, complexity analysis, and interview preparation materials.
courses.keywords: data structures algorithms computer science programming

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms including regression, classification, and clustering. Features Python/R implementations, datasets, and practical project examples.
courses.keywords: machine learning artificial intelligence computer science python

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Complete full-stack web development course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks. Includes project templates, deployment guides, and industry best practices for responsive design.
courses.keywords: web development programming html css javascript

courses.title: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Comprehensive database design and management including SQL, normalization, and performance optimization. Contains database schemas, query examples, and real-world application case studies.
